body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Aaron Watson and the customer's name is Carolyn Rogers.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about billing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I'm with Easy Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, I'm looking for some help with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I would be happy to help. May I start by asking your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! To better assist you, could you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's July fifth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. And can you also provide me with the last four digits of your Social Security number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it is one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you, John. I have your details now. How can I help you with your account today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help with that! Thank you for your time today, John. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out.
